thread.title: Kirk Watson stepping down as Democratic leader
thread.title_full: Kirk Watson stepping down as Democratic leader

title: Kirk Watson stepping down as Democratic leader
text:
Kirk Watson stepping down as Democratic leader State Sen. Kirk Watson announced Thursday he will step down as leader of the Senate Democratic Caucus. Post to Facebook Kirk Watson stepping down as Democratic leader State Sen. Kirk Watson announced Thursday he will step down as leader of the Senate Democratic Caucus.  //kvue.tv/1Ll0qd0   Kirk Watson stepping down as Democratic leader KVUE 9:09 p.m. CDT October 8, 2015 State Sen. Kirk Watson CONNECT TWEET   – State Sen. Kirk Watson announced Thursday he will step down as leader of the Senate Democratic Caucus. 
Watson said in a statement, “I'm ready to pass the baton to the next Chair and want to do it so that the new Chair has plenty of time to prepare for the upcoming election year, convention, and then the next session.” 
Watson has led the state senators in his party during the last two legislative sessions. He was first elected to the Texas Senate in 2006. Read or Share this story: http://kvue.tv/1Ll0qd0 TOP VIDEOS
